item.title: The Trump Administration’s Lawfare Will Destroy More Than Just Itself
item.description: The cost of the politics of this era will be felt long after Trump is gone.

item.title: The Saddest Part of This Recent Economic Lunacy
item.description: The president has offered four ideas in the past week that are all a huge problem — for the people these ideas are supposed to be helping.

item.title: How America Can Win the ‘Tech Triad’ Race
item.description: If the U.S. hopes to stay ahead of China, we need a national, coordinated strategy for developing emerging technologies.

item.title: Give Thanks
item.description: It’s not just for the holidays.

item.title: After the Venezuela Raid, Trump Should Finally Stand Up to Putin
item.description: Successfully capturing one of Russia’s closest allies should give the U.S. the confidence to adopt a more effective and honorable posture toward Russi...
